room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: My group of 6 Escaped the Mob! It was a great time and we plan to go in December when the new Double Agent room opens - Can't Wait!!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Had a great time tonight! What a wonderful time. We'll be back.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Lots of fun, well organized, good price. Went for "team building" but would well for a group of friends/party. Duration is perfect (60min).

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Took a young group and even though we did not finish we had a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: We had an amazing time Escaping the Mob with our friends. We had a group of 5 kids ranging from 7 - 15 and 3 adults. We made it out with about 8 minutes to spare. Tons of fun with puzzles that will challenge you and get you working together to solve the mysteries within. Recommended to any group and great for families.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: This was our second escape room and our favorite so far. The theme and riddles where right on. You dont feel like a puzzle is impossible or at a lose. Flows really well. They did a great job setting up the room and some interesting ways to find some clues. Super amazing. I hope we go back to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Mob" by Escape the Room Challenge in Cincinnati
review: Simply awesome and can't wait to go with another group of friends sometime soon I would recommend this to anybody that wants to have fun with your family or build a team
